Redeem: 3. Redeem rewards in the real world
step_into_the_world: Step into the new world of gaming, where everyone can
Players_desc: Players can rent in-game assets (NFT) and receive training from Guilds to start playing any blockchain games for free
Guilds_desc: Guilds and Players will split the players' earnings generated from the games they have played
Enjoy_desc: Players can easily convert their crypto earnings to licensed e-wallet providers, telco and utility bill credits as well as shopping/restaurant vouchers
Explore_desc: Gamers can choose to purchase or borrow in-game assets (NFT) to start playing a variety of crypto games.
EarnMoney_desc: Gamers can earn cryptocurrencies from playing crypto games, making their hobby more productive.
Redeem_desc: Gamers can convert their cryptocurrency earnings to licensed e-wallet credits, telco credits, utility bill credits and others.
system_desc1: We give access for players to play and earn money without any capital
system_desc2: We empower guilds with cutting-edge tools that help them scale
system_desc3: We allow games to discover potential players and guilds
system_desc4: We work with multiple crypto-to-fiat services for players
cross_des1: Start earning with only a mobile phone and an internet connection
cross_des2: Cutting-edge tools and data-driven insights in one screen
backed_by: Backed by the Best in the Industry
Immerse Yourself: Immerse yourself in our curated list of games, from FPS to MMORPG.
hyfen_play_desc: A mobile app for gamers who want to earn additional income by playing crypto games.
hyfen_tools_desc1: A web app for guilds and managers that want to earn passive income by lending out their game items (NFT) to players.
hyfen_tools_desc2: passive income by lending out their game items (NFT) to players.
